title: What are some games similar to Nier Automata and Witcher 3? Looking for similarity gameplay wise (Openworld, focus on story) - Quora

response.answer_text: I hope I’m answering this right, because in my guessing, you were asking for Video games which have rich story as Nier or Witcher 3. I haven't played all of this, but in my opinion these are them : Hellblade : Senua’s sacrifice (2017 RPG adventure game)Atmostpheric, Psychological, Female Protagonist  Save 50% on Hellblade: Senua's Sacrifice on Steam A psychological one, a mind blowing twist at the end, Highly recommended, but never find any review before playing it, because it really will spoil the game. Life is strange (2015 RPG game)Story rich, Choices Matter, Great Soundtrack  Life is Strange - Episode 1 on Steam A psychological drama, full of choices and consequences, proceed with cautions. The Last of Us I haven’t played this one but have read a lot about it. God of War IV Surely this GOTY won for its story wasn’t it ? Hope this helps “[^====^]”

What are games similar to Call of Duty and Star Wars - Jedi Outcast…well…you can shoot in both games but that’s all similar about them. You have to be more specific. For Witcher similar are - Kingdom Come Deliverance, Bethesda Games, Bioware Games For Nier - Bayonetta, Devil May Cry, Ninja Gaiden
